name: Mad-Dash Maestro (demo)
description:
This is a concept that I've been working on for a while. It's a simple platformer game that focuses on the music! It's a two-song demo as of right now, but I'll be updating the game as I work on more songs.

ControlsMoveArrow keysAccept/Jump
ZBackX

Update notes

  • New song added: "Hop To It"
  • Note Names option now available
